summary: ON JANUARY 17 I HAD WORK PERFORMED FOR RECALL 01V157000 , WHICH INVOLVED REPLACING THE FUEL SENDING UNIT TO PREVENT THE CAR FROM RUNNING OUT OF GAS WHEN THE FUEL GUAGE INDICATED A FULL TANK. ON JANUARY 20, I EXPERIENCED THE VERY PROBLEM THAT THE RECALL WAS SUPPOSED TO CORRECT. I HAD NOT PREVIOUSLY EXPERINECED THIS PROBLEM. I RAN OUT OF GAS, ALTHOUGH THE FUEL GUAGE SHOWED MORE THAN 1/4 TANK REMAINING.
